sources.title: Kingdom of the Spiders
sources.description: Title: Kingdom of the Spiders Summary: In rural Arizona, countless killer tarantulas are migrating through a farm town, killing every living thing in their path. The town's veterinarian will do everything in his power to survive the onslaught. Directed by: John 'Bud' Cardos Actors: Production Company: Arachnid Productions Ltd. Release Date: November 1977 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.85 : 1 Investigating the mysterious deaths of a number of farm animals, vet Rack Hansen discovers that his town lies in the path of hoards of migrating tarantulas. Before he can take action, the streets are overrun by killer spiders, trapping a small group of towns folk in a remote hotel.

metadata.Plot: Investigating the mysterious deaths of a number of farm animals, vet Rack Hansen discovers that his town lies in the path of hoards of migrating tarantulas. Before he can take action, the streets are overrun by killer spiders, trapping a small group of towns folk in a remote hotel.
metadata.Writer: Richard Robinson, Alan Caillou, Jeffrey M. Sneller
metadata.Actors: William Shatner, Tiffany Bolling, Woody Strode
